## Open Science Template

This project website was created using the [Open Science Template][open-sci-template].
It is powered by many wonderful publicly available tools:
[R Markdown][rmarkdown], [knitr][], and [pandoc][].
In fact, the initial template for this site was modeled after the [R Markdown website][rmd-site].
The site is hosted using [GitHub Pages][gh-pages].
To create your own project website, follow the instructions available at the template's [GitHub page][open-sci-template].

[open-sci-template]: https://github.com/jdblischak/open-sci-template
[rmarkdown]: http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/
[knitr]: http://yihui.name/knitr/
[pandoc]: http://pandoc.org/
[rmd-site]: https://github.com/rstudio/rmarkdown/tree/gh-pages
[gh-pages]: https://pages.github.com/
